text: Ara smarana kara, yakhana sayatana tadera jan'ya tadera karyabalike sobhaniya karechila ebam balechila, ‘aja manusera madhye ke'u'i tomadera upara bijaya arjanakari ne'i, ara niscaya ami tomadera pase abasthanakari.’ Atahpara du dala yakhana paraspara drsyamana hala takhana se pichane sare parala ebam balala, ‘niscaya ami tomadera theke samparkamukta, niscaya ami emana kichu dekhechi ya tomara dekhate pa'o na. Niscaya ami allah‌ke bhaya kari, ’ara allah‌ sasti dane kathora
